panels.description: The total number of NGINX config reloads.
panels.title: NGINX Config Reloads

panels.description: The current number of connections.
panels.title: HTTP Connections Count

panels.description: The total number of connections, since NGINX was last started or reloaded.
panels.title: HTTP Connections

panels.description: The number of client requests that are currently being processed.
panels.title: HTTP Request Processing Count

panels.description: The total number of client requests received, since the last collection interval.
panels.title: HTTP Request Count

panels.description: The total number of client requests received, since NGINX was last started or reloaded.
panels.title: Total HTTP Requests

panels.description: The total number of HTTP byte IO.
panels.title: HTTP Request IO - Receive

panels.description: The total number of HTTP byte IO.
panels.title: HTTP Request IO - Transmit

panels.description: The total number of requests completed without sending a response.
panels.title: HTTP Requests Discarded

panels.description: The total number of HTTP responses sent to clients since the last collection interval, grouped by status code range.
panels.title: HTTP Response Count -  ServerZone

panels.description: The total number of responses for ServerZone, grouped by status code range.
panels.title: HTTP Response Status - ServerZone

panels.description: The total number of HTTP responses sent to clients since the last collection interval, grouped by status code range.
panels.title: HTTP Response Count - LocationZone

panels.description: The total number of responses for LocationZone, grouped by status code range.
panels.title: HTTP Response Status - LocationZone

panels.description: The average number of active connections per HTTP upstream peer.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Connection Count

panels.description: The current number of upstream peers removed from the group but still processing active client requests.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Zombie Count

panels.description: The current count of peers on the HTTP upstream grouped by state.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Count

panels.description: The current number of idle keepalive connections per HTTP upstream.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Keepalive Count

panels.description: Number of times the server became unavailable for client requests (“unavail”).
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Unavailables

panels.description: The total number of health check requests made to a HTTP upstream peer.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Health Checks

panels.description: Current state of an upstream peer in deployment.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer State

panels.description: The total number of unsuccessful attempts to communicate with the HTTP upstream peer.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Fails

panels.description: The total number of client requests forwarded to the HTTP upstream peer.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Requests

panels.description: The average time to get the full response from the HTTP upstream peer.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Response Time

panels.description: The total number of responses obtained from the HTTP upstream peer grouped by status range.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Responses

panels.description: The total number of requests rejected due to the queue overflow.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Queue Overflows

panels.description: The total number of byte IO received per HTTP upstream peer.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer IO - Receive

panels.description: The total number of byte IO transmitted per HTTP upstream peer.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer IO - Transmit

panels.description: The maximum number of requests that can be in the queue at the same time.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Queue Limit

panels.description: The current number of requests in the queue.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Queue Usage

panels.description: The average time to get the response header from the HTTP upstream peer.
panels.title: HTTP Upstream Peer Header Time

panels.description: The current number of free memory slots.
panels.title: Free Memory Slots

panels.description: The current number of used memory slots.
panels.title: Memory Slots in Use

panels.description: The current number of free memory pages.
panels.title: Free Memory Pages

panels.description: The current number of used memory pages.
panels.title: Memory Pages in Use

panels.description: The number of attempts to allocate memory of specified size.
panels.title: Successful Memory Allocation of Specified Size Attempts

panels.description: The number of attempts to allocate memory of specified size.
panels.title: Failed Memory Allocation of Specified Size Attempts

panels.description: The total number of SSL certificate verification failures.
panels.title: SSL Certificate Verify Failures

panels.description: The total number of SSL handshakes.
panels.title: SSL Handshakes

panels.description: The total number of connections accepted from clients.
panels.title: Stream Connections - Accepted

panels.description: The number of client connections that are currently being processed.
panels.title: Stream Connection Processing Count

panels.description: The total number of Stream byte IO.
panels.title: Stream IO - Transmit

panels.description: Total number of connections completed without creating a session.
panels.title: Stream Connections - Discarded

panels.description: The total number of Stream byte IO.
panels.title: Stream IO - Receive

panels.description: The total number of completed sessions.
panels.title: Stream Session Status

panels.description: The current number of Stream Upstream Peer connections.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer Connections Count

panels.description: The total number of client connections forwarded to this stream upstream peer.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer Connections

panels.description: The average time to connect to the stream upstream peer.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer Connection Time

panels.description: The current number of stream upstream peers grouped by state.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer Count

panels.description: The total number of health check requests made to the stream upstream peer.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer Health Checks

panels.description: How many times the server became unavailable for client connections (state “unavail”) due to the number of unsuccessful attempts reaching the max_fails threshold.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer Unavailable

panels.description: Current state of upstream peers in deployment. If any of the upstream peers in the deployment match the given state then the value will be 1. If no upstream peer is a match then the value will be 0.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer State

panels.description: The current number of peers removed from the group but still processing active client connections.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Zombie Count

panels.description: The average time to receive the last byte of data for the stream upstream peer.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer Response Time

panels.description: The average time to receive the first byte of data for the stream upstream peer.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer TTFB Time

panels.description: The total number of Stream Upstream Peer byte IO.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer IO - Receive

panels.description: The total number of Stream Upstream Peer byte IO.
panels.title: Stream Upstream Peer IO - Transmit

list.description: Filter by Stream Upstream Peer Name.
